member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Moisture
member.summary: A Moisture module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Moisture.#ctor(System.Int32)

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Moisture.ReadMoisture
member.summary: The moisture reading from the sensor.
member.returns: A value where 0 is fully dry and 1000 (or greater) is completely wet.
